      • checkVersion

        public int checkVersion(java.lang.String name)
        Checks the version of a specific plugin's db.
        Parameters:
        name- - The name of the plugin.
        Returns:
        Returns the version of the plugin or 0 if none was found.

      • updateVersion

        public int updateVersion(int version,
                java.lang.String pluginname)
        Updates the version number for a plugin. You must specify what the current version number is.
        Parameters:
        version- - The current version of the plugin.
        pluginname- - The plugin name.
        Returns:
        Returns the new version of the db.
